page.title: 04Ollerton - Population Facts
page.content: The first table shows the ages of people in the combined Ollerton and Boughton area:- {Age of Population _________________ No. of people aged 0-15yrs. 3641 No. of people aged 15-64yrs. 8547 No. of people aged 65+ yrs. 1169 _____ Total 13357 _____ The next table clearly shows the importance of coal to Ollerton. Ollerton Boughton ________________ People without car 47% 16% Single-parent families 10% 7% People unemployed 16.7% 15.1% {People dependent upon {coal for employment 82% n/a
